items.desc: Young and Energetic is completely a plant based derivatives developed by a Team of Researchers. Founded in 2010, Y & E is an original product from our Research Desk. Over a period of 5yrs Y & E continues to prove its promising effect on multiple Disorders with most satisfying health benefits.

With 9 Products and promising Health Benefits Y & E stands ahead of the existing commercial products. It resolves most of the common day to day problems from Sleep disorder, in digestion, inactivity, low energy also it enhances the beauty from within.
